00019 #ifndef _MATRIX_H
00020 #define _MATRIX_H

00027 #define EPSILON 0.00001

00029 using namespace std;

00031 //======================Class Defns.=============================
00032 class Matrix;
00033 class DimensionException;
00034 class IncomputableException;
00035 
00036 ostream& operator<<( ostream &os, const Matrix &rhs );
00037 
00038 //======================Class: Matrix=============================
00039 class Matrix
00040 {
00041    friend ostream& operator<<( ostream &os, const Matrix &rhs );
00042 
00043    public:
00044       ~Matrix(); // Destructor
00045       Matrix( unsigned int rows, unsigned int cols ); // Constructor
00046       Matrix( const vector<Matrix> &colVec ); // Constructor
00047       Matrix( const Matrix &m, unsigned int colStart, unsigned int colEnd ); // Constructor
00048       Matrix( const Matrix &rhs ); // Copy constructor
00049       
00050       static Matrix getIdentity( unsigned int n ); // Gets n x n identity matrix.
00051       
00052       Matrix& operator=( const Matrix &rhs );
00053       Matrix& operator+=( const Matrix &rhs );
00054       Matrix& operator-=( const Matrix &rhs );
00055       const Matrix operator+( const Matrix &other ) const;
00056       const Matrix operator-( const Matrix &other ) const;
00057       const Matrix operator*( const Matrix &rhs ) const;
00058       Matrix getRow( unsigned int row ) const;
00059       Matrix getCol( unsigned int col ) const;
00060       unsigned int getRows() const;
00061       unsigned int getCols() const;
00062       inline double getVal( unsigned int row, unsigned int col ) const;
00063       inline void setVal( unsigned int row, unsigned int col, double val );
00064       void setRow( unsigned int row, vector<double> vec );
00065       void setCol( unsigned int col, vector<double> vec );
00066       Matrix inverse() const;
00067       bool hasInverse() const;
00068       
00069       void rref();
00070       bool hasNonZeroDiags() const;
00071       void swapRows( unsigned int row1, unsigned int row2 );
00072       void appendCols( const Matrix& other );
00073       
00074    private:
00075       unsigned int _rows;
00076       unsigned int _cols;
00077       double *_data;
00078 };
00079 
00080 //======================Class: DimensionException=============================
00081 class DimensionException: public exception
00082 {
00083    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00084    {
00085       return "Dimensions of argument were not expected.";
00086    }
00087    
00088    public:
00089       DimensionException(unsigned int argRows, unsigned int argCols, bool rowsMatter, bool colsMatter )
00090       {
00091          _argRows = argRows;
00092          _argCols = argCols;
00093          _rowsMatter = rowsMatter;
00094          _colsMatter = colsMatter;
00095       }
00096       
00097       bool colsMatter(){ return _colsMatter; }
00098       bool rowsMatter(){ return _rowsMatter; }
00099       unsigned int getArgRows(){ return _argRows; }
00100       unsigned int getArgCols(){ return _argCols; }
00101       
00102    private:
00103       unsigned int _argRows;
00104       unsigned int _argCols;
00105       bool _rowsMatter;
00106       bool _colsMatter;
00107 };
00108 
00109 //======================Class: IncomputableException=============================
00110 class IncomputableException: public exception
00111 {
00112    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00113    {
00114       return "Could not compute what you asked.";
00115    }
00116 };
00117 
00118 #endif
